short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension hides YouTube comments for a distraction-free viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Comment Hide is a Chrome extension that hides the comment section on YouTube.
By using this extension, you can automatically hide the comment section that appears on YouTube video pages, allowing you to watch videos with greater focus.

You can toggle the visibility of the comment section by clicking the extension icon. However, please note that the current implementation does not support multiple tabs.

Enjoy a stress-free YouTube viewing experience with YouTube Comment Hide.
